Text: Necesito consejosI dont know if my dad told you but I am at Tulane law school and enjoying it very much The work is challeging but I am really happy with the my choice of paths The campus is beautiful the people are normal the town is amazing a bit distracting at times and my professors and the law school in general are fantastic I am writing you to ask for your advice They are beginning to apply the job search pressure to us it is already the th week and I am trying to figure out my best course of action I have heard that most of the big firms in Houston arent even looking for students after only their st year that they prefer to interview after the nd year for summer clerk positions and then associate jobs Do you know of any smaller firms or specific attorneys that I might be able to pursue with a letter and resume What did you do after your first year Did you stay in Texas I do know that I want to practice in Houston so I think that working there during this my first summer would be a smart idea It will at least give me more time to make contacts meet people What do you think Any thoughtsadvice you have would be greatly appreciated Thank you Katy

summer clerkship resume Cc Holland I am a first year law student at Tulane and currently seeking a summer associate position with a wellregarded Houston law firm I have attached my resume and would very much like to meet with you while I am home in Houston during winter break in order to discuss a possible clerkship with your firm Thank you for your time and I look forward to hearing from you Warmest regards Katy Gottsponer resumeKGottsponerdoc
